text:
="preserve">Enrique Ramón Fajarnés (1929 – 14 September 2020) was a Spanish politician and lawyer. He was born in Santiago de Compostela, Spain. Ramón Fajarnés was Mayor of Ibiza from 1971 to 1974. He was a Senator between 1982 to 1986. He was also a Deputy from 1986 to 1993. He was a member of the Union of the Democratic Centre.
Ramón Fajarnés died on 14 September 2020 in Ibiza at the age of 91.
